title: Add phone contact to Support & Contact Us section

requirements.text: Update the site’s “Support” / “Contact Us” area in the footer to display the phone number "1-242-821-0504" as the contact method, formatted as a clickable phone link (tel:).

quotes: in the section where it says support and contact us put my number 1 242 821 0504

acceptanceCriteria: In the footer Support section (frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx), the phone number 1-242-821-0504 is visible to users.
The phone number is rendered as a clickable link using href="tel:+12428210504" (or equivalent) and is readable in both light and dark themes.
No other footer sections (Services, Quick Links, Connect) regress visually or functionally.

constraints: Frontend files under frontend/src/components/ui and other paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths must not be edited.
Do not introduce any external services (e.g., SMS, email providers) for contact functionality.
nonGoals: Do not build a contact form, live chat, or SMS/WhatsApp messaging workflow.
Do not change backend canister logic or data models.
Do not implement the logo update until the user provides the logo image asset.
